hero.name: Dylan Mazur Zgainer
hero.title: Front End JR Developer
hero.subtitle:
Passionate about designing modern and functional web interfaces focused on user experience, mainly using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

I am in my second year of a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and am looking for a job that allows me to grow professionally, keep learning, and support my studies.

projects.title: FEATURED PROJECTS
projects.subtitle-1:
I designed and developed a website from scratch, managing the entire process from initial design to completion.
It was one of my biggest challenges, working in direct and constant communication with the client to ensure an exceptional result.
projects.subtitle-2: I led the redesign of a website for a hotel  company with a presence in the U.S. and Europe, optimizing   design and functionality to enhance its global reach and  user experience.
projects.subtitle-3:
I developed the website for a cigar lounge with a presence in the U.S., focusing on a sleek and functional design to attract its target audience and highlight its unique identity.

Built with a CMS (at the client's request).
projects.subtitle-4:
I redesigned the website for a windows and doors company with a presence in the U.S., improving its design and functionality to showcase its services and reach more customers.

Built with a CMS (at the client's request).

about-me.title: ABOUT ME
about-me.subtitle:
My name is Dylan Mazur Zgainer, and I am from Argentina, where I currently live. I am in the second year of my Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science at Universidad Siglo 21.

Three years ago, I discovered the fascinating world of programming, and over the past year, I have been fully committed to constant learning.

Currently, my main goal is to continue growing professionally, expanding my knowledge and skills, and thus be able to afford my studies.
